code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     super.setUp().     NetworkConfig.createStandardWithoutFile(). }
protected CoapClient createClient(String path) {     return createClient(path, PORT). }
protected CoapClient createClient(String path, int port) {     String url = String.format("coap://localhost:%d/%s", port, FileUtil.stripLeadingSeparator(path)).     return new CoapClient(url). }
